title: APD: Teen found dead in East Anchorage after report of shots fired
content:
Anchorage police called early Sunday to a report of shots fired in East Anchorage arrived to find a teenage boy dead.
Police said in a 3 a.m. dispatch they were notified of a "disturbance" near Sixth Avenue and Newell Street, off Boniface Parkway, just after 2 a.m.
